doc:
Ronald Lacey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronald_Lacey 0 Ronald William Lacey (28 September 1935 – 15 May 1991) was an English actor. He made numerous television and film appearances over a 30-year period and is perhaps best remembered for his roles as Harris in Porridge, Gestapo agent Major Arnold Ernst Toht in Raiders of the Lost Ark and the Bishop of Bath and Wells in Blackadder II. Ronald_William_Lacey ( 28_September_1935 – 15_May_1991 ) was an_English_actor . He made numerous_television_and_film_appearances over a_30-year_period and is_perhaps_best_remembered for his_roles as Harris in Porridge , Gestapo_agent Major_Arnold_Ernst_Toht in Raiders of the_Lost_Ark and the_Bishop of Bath_and_Wells in Blackadder_II .
